data.event: Summers start in late March and go on till mid-June, the average temperature being around 30 °C (86 °F), with the peak of summer in May, when the highs regularly exceed 40 °C (104 °F).

data.event: Summers start in late March and go on till mid-June, the average temperature being around 30 °C (86 °F), with the peak of summer in May, when the highs regularly exceed 40 °C (104 °F).
The monsoon starts in late June and ends in late September.
The monsoon starts in late June and ends in late September.
These months see about 34 inches (860 mm) of precipitation.

event.title: rise again up to late October

data.event: Temperatures rise again up to late October when winter starts, which lasts up to early March.
